cast.name: 伊丽莎白·诺伊曼-菲特尔 Elisabeth Neumann-Viertel
汉斯-彼得·科尔夫 Hans-Peter Korff
康斯坦丁·威克 Konstantin Wecker

introduction: 巴伐利亚农村战后童年的故事。玛丽安1945年5岁，当时她和她的德国籍少数民族父母从捷克斯洛伐克的特蕾兹_恩以流离失所者的身份来到斯特劳伯。她的父亲曾是德国军队的一名士兵，他回到了战前的教师生涯。在村里牧师的长期指责下，玛丽安和她的朋友们对宗教和性很好奇。他们特别喜欢美国的胃肠道。作为占领军的一部分，他开始与一个漂亮的邻居发生关系，同时慷慨地向镇上的孩子分发口香糖。所以对他们来说，和平（弗里登）是薄荷味。但是传教士关于苏联“伊凡斯”邪恶的不断布道唤醒了玛丽安对战争创伤的记忆，当“和平先生”接到去韩国的命令时，这种记忆会更加强烈……在新现实主义场景和丰富多彩的梦中，这部电影用独特的摄影作品从一个孩子的角度来看待冷战禁忌。电子战。1983年，玛丽安·罗森鲍姆（Marianne Rosenbaum）在这部以巴伐利亚和美国明星阵容出现的海玛特电影中，在重新武装辩论的时代，替代性的历史可以被视为一种政治声明。The story of a post-war childhood in rural Bavaria. Marianne is five in 1945, when she and her ethnic German parents arrive in Straubing as displaced persons from Terezín in then Czechoslovakia. Her father, a former soldier in the German army, returns to his pre-war occupation as a teacher. Under permanent rebuke from the village priest, Marianne and her friends are curious about religion and sex. They are especially fascinated by an American GI. Part of the occupation forces, he starts up an affair with a pretty neighbour, while generously distributing chewing gum to the town’s children. So for them, peace (Frieden) tastes of peppermint. But the preacher’s constant sermons about the evil of the Soviet “Ivans” awaken in Marianne memories of the trauma of war, which intensify when “Mr Peace” receives orders to go to Korea … In neo-realistic scenes and colourful dream sequences, the film uses idiosyncratic camerawork to look at Cold War taboos from a child’s point of view. Made in 1983, during the era of rearmament debates, Marianne Rosenbaum’s alternative take on history in this Heimatfilm, with its Bavarian and American star cast, can be considered a political statement.
